review: This product was received on time and worked as described. It's great to see new Chromecast support being offered constantly.I can't wait to see all the future applications of this device.Pros:-It's cheap-Let's you share your desktop screen, Chrome tabs, videos, music via the various apps available-I was able to download the Chromecast app on my mobile in Singapore which is great! Thanks for unblocking that Google (I think they did that originally to maintain that customer experience while apps, etc. were being built).-I love the apps connection with Plex, Youtube and the other new apps from big brands joining the mix.Cons:-A few seconds of delay sometimes after clicking to load apps and play videos/ movies on Viki/ Youtube. This may be due to my wifi connection but worth noting.-Does not fully support local Singapore TV stations yet (e.g. Toggle, ChannelNewsAsia, etc.)
